Uses of Package
de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.datasource.filter

  • Packages that use de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.datasource.filter 
    Package Description
    de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.datasource
    Data normalization (and reconstitution) of data sets.
    de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.datasource.filter
    Data filtering, in particular for normalization and projection.
    de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.datasource.filter.normalization
    Data normalization.
    de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.datasource.filter.transform
    Data space transformations.
  • Classes in de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.datasource.filter used by de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.datasource 
    Class and Description
    ObjectFilter
    Object filters as part of the input step.
  • Classes in de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.datasource.filter used by de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.datasource.filter 
    Class and Description
    AbstractConversionFilter
    Abstract base class for simple conversion filters such as normalizations and projections.
    AbstractStreamConversionFilter
    Abstract base class for simple conversion filters such as normalizations and projections.
    AbstractStreamFilter
    Abstract base class for streaming filters.
    ByLabelFilter
    A filter to sort the data set by some label.
    ClassLabelFilter
    Class that turns a label column into a class label column.
    ClassLabelFromPatternFilter
    Streaming filter to derive an outlier class label.
    DropNaNFilter
    A filter to drop all records that contain NaN values.
    ExternalIDFilter
    Class that turns a label column into an external ID column.
    FixedDBIDsFilter
    This filter assigns static DBIDs, based on the sequence the objects appear in the bundle by adding a column of DBID type to the bundle.
    NoMissingValuesFilter
    A filter to remove entries that have missing values.
    ObjectFilter
    Object filters as part of the input step.
    RandomSamplingStreamFilter
    Subsampling stream filter.
    ReplaceNaNWithRandomFilter
    A filter to replace all NaN values.
    ShuffleObjectsFilter
    A filter to shuffle the dataset.
    SplitNumberVectorFilter
    Split an existing column into two types.
    StreamFilter
    Streaming filters are often more efficient (less memory use) and can be used in more settings.
    VectorDimensionalityFilter
    Filter to remove all vectors that do not have the desired dimensionality.
  • Classes in de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.datasource.filter used by de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.datasource.filter.normalization 
    Class and Description
    AbstractConversionFilter
    Abstract base class for simple conversion filters such as normalizations and projections.
    AbstractStreamConversionFilter
    Abstract base class for simple conversion filters such as normalizations and projections.
    AbstractStreamFilter
    Abstract base class for streaming filters.
    AbstractVectorConversionFilter
    Abstract class for filters that produce number vectors.
    AbstractVectorStreamConversionFilter
    Abstract base class for streaming filters that produce vectors.
    ObjectFilter
    Object filters as part of the input step.
    StreamFilter
    Streaming filters are often more efficient (less memory use) and can be used in more settings.
